properties.displayName: New Root Certificate Installed Via Certutil.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains "-addstore" or ProcessCommandLine contains "/addstore") and ProcessCommandLine contains "root" and (FolderPath endswith "\\certutil.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "CertUtil.exe")

tags.name: description
tags.value:
Detects execution of "certutil" with the "addstore" flag in order to install a new certificate on the system.
Adversaries may install a root certificate on a compromised system to avoid warnings when connecting to adversary controlled web servers.
